item.title: Hackers steal and destroy millions from Iran’s largest crypto exchange
item.description: It's the latest cyberattack on Iran claimed by a pro-Israeli hacking group since the latest flare up in tensions between the two countries.

item.title: Grifin secures $11M to make investing less intimidating for its female user base
item.description: Investment app Grifin secured a $11 million Series A funding round.

item.title: Trump set to delay TikTok ban with yet another extension
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump will issue another extension to decide the fate of TikTok, pushing it by 90 days, the White House said on Tuesday.

item.title: Pope Leo makes AI’s threat to humanity a signature issue
item.description: Pope Leo XIV, the new American pope, is making the threat of AI to humanity a key issue of his legacy.

item.title: After Shopify bought his last startup, Birk Jernström wants to help developers build one-person unicorns
item.description: With Polar as their ‘Merchant of Record’ responsible for handling billing and taxes, developers can sell online products and SaaS subscriptions global...
